tool.name: SAGA.ta_profiles.4
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayDEM False isArrayVALUES True isArrayLINES False isArrayNAME False output_data_PROFILE $output_data_PROFILE output_data_PROFILES $output_data_PROFILES name SAGA.ta_profiles.4 DEM $DEM VALUES $VALUES LINES $LINES NAME $NAME SPLIT $SPLIT prefer $prefer response $response outputType_PROFILE $OutputSection_PROFILE.outputType_PROFILE transmissionMode_PROFILE $OutputSection_PROFILE.transmissionMode_PROFILE outputType_PROFILES $OutputSection_PROFILES.outputType_PROFILES transmissionMode_PROFILES $OutputSection_PROFILES.transmissionMode_PROFILES

param.name: DEM
param.label: DEM
param.help: DEM The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-envi, tiff, x-ogc-aaigrid, png

param.name: VALUES
param.label: Values
param.help: Additional values that shall be saved to the output table. The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-envi, tiff, x-ogc-aaigrid, png

param.name: LINES
param.label: Lines
param.help: Lines The following data types are allowed in the txt file: json, xml, vnd.google-earth.kml+xml

param.name: NAME
param.label: Name
param.help: Naming for split lines The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_PROFILE
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_PROFILE
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

section.name: OutputSection_PROFILES
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_PROFILES
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: Create profiles from a grid based DEM for each line of a lines layer.
